attributes.action: Government must act to help rough sleepers this winter
attributes.additional_details: Government statistics for rough sleeping in England show an increase from 1,768 in 2010 to 3,569 in 2015.
attributes.background: Homelessness and rough sleeping have more than doubled since 2010. Many of those sleeping on the streets have learning disabilities and mental health problems, since the government has cut benefits and frontline services. We need new services and funding to stop more suffering and deaths this winter

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to help people who are sleeping rough.
